content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on issuing the Certificate, including
qualifying eligibility for a Certificate
who is eligible to receive a Certificate
when a Certificate is not authorized
verification of service for Certificates
issuing Certificates and avoiding duplication
ensuring accuracy of the Certificate
annotating Certificate mail
issuing a Certificate when service cannot be verified
requests for multiple Certificates
considering character of discharge (COD) when handling Certificate requests
, and
printing Certificates
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D  - Memorialization
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D
